Ooooops ! I crashed, follow the coming screen to send report to developer to help fix the issue ! Unknown error happened,please try again CallAmbulance has crashed An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK. You might add your comments about the problem below: There appears to be an unexpected issue. Please try again later. Thank you ! Congrats ! Now You Can Stay Safe\n With Call Ambulance ! Hospitals/Organisations My Doctors
Care Giver Care Givers are people who patients designate to be able to take care of the patient in case of any illness. Care Givers have complete access including edit to the patients information. Emergency Contacts get notified when you are in an emergency. An emergency contact will have read only access to all your information. Hospitals/Organizations allows you to manage all your relationships with healthcare organizations be it a hospital, lab or a pharmacy. Search CareGiver

I request you to be my Care Giver on https://www.callambulance.in/.Please register yourselves at https://www.callambulance.in/ and let me know so that i can set you up as my Care Giver. \nregards,\n "Search Hospitals/Organisations"
Adding an Employer would provide the Employer access to your Demographic Information,Contact Information, Insurance Information and also let them get notified in case you are in an emergency. Adding an Educational Institute would provide the Educational Institute access to your Demographic Information,Contact Information, Insurance Information and also let them get notified in case you are in an emergency. Adding a Organisation would provide the selected Organisation with View Access to your Demographic Information, Contact Information and Edit Access to Health History. Confirm if you want to proceed. Please Add Member First Patient Added Successfully Please select Blood Group Couldn\'t communicate your location to EMRI.You will have to inform them verbally Emergency Location not found.You will have to inform your ambulance provider verbally Couldn\'t communicate this incident to your contacts.Please share tracking link with them Couldn\'t communicate your location to Ambulance Provider.You will have to inform them verbally Terms & Conditions Accept Reject We as an organisation have a desire to save lives.However with quite a few interdependencies it is not possible to guarantee service levels.We are making a best case effort to bring together multiple ecosystem players to make a coordinated effort.The user acknowledges and understands that this app does not guarantee a pick up by from a hospital/108. The information in the app is used to facilitate a faster/efficient pick up for the person in distress.The applications and any information contained or provided through the applications are provided “As is” and “As Available” with no warranties whatsoever.Your use of the app is at your free will and at your sole risk.CallAmbulance is not responsible for,and shall have no liability in connection with any transactions or disputes between you,first responder,ambulance driver,ambulance provide,hospital and 108. *** IMPORTANT : CallAmbulance is a platform where emergency providers have to be on a network. Currently CallAmbulance is focused on Hyderabad, India. Over time, it will build out to other places too. So part of the application integrating with emergency providers is not implemented in other cities. Even if you are not in Hyderabad, you can use the application to get your family informed, build your own blood donor friends network & many other features *** Nearby EMTWebservices/getNearestHospitals First Responder Help Videos Screen overlay detected Allow Call 108 108 Track Redial

Ambulance No: Failed to fetch driver\'s current location details No doctor\'s available for the Organisation (OR) You might have added all the Doctor\'s in this Organisation as your Notifying Doctor\'s Launch CallAmbulance From Dialer Enabling this will allow you to raise an emergency from dialer screen on dialing 108. This will help share precise location to 108 Couldn\'t capture your pic.Please try again Give Permission Phone Access required to make the call to your chosen emergency provider during an emergency Contacts Access required to find all your contacts in the CallAmbulance database and give you access to your friends Blood Group provided your friend\'s number is stored in their phone as well GPS Access required to be able to pass your GPS location to the emergency provider to enable them to reach the emergency location faster SMS Access required to read the OTP sent by SMS and also to initiate emergency when there is no internet available Phone permission is required to identify the network availability. This is mandatory, please grant this permission Camera Access required to enable you to upload your prescriptions or lab reports for storing and sharing with your Doctor Please grant the required permissions GPS Access required to capture your current location to provide you the nearby hospitals/ambulances/bloodbanks/labs SMS Access is required to inform your Emergency Contacts,Care Givers and Ambulance providers about the emergency through SMS when there is no internet or when internet fails while raising emergency Storage Access required to enable you to upload your profile pic, prescriptions or lab reports for storing and sharing with your Doctor and also view your preferred emergency provider.This is a mandatory permission These are your doctor\'s who get notified when ever you upload any report or raise and emergency so that they can help you as needed

Add your 5 trusted friends, who share same blood group as you & will step up during an emergency Invite up to 5 contacts to join CallAmbulance. SMS invite will be sent to each of the selected contacts. This action may incur SMS charges as applicable. Enabling Apps auto-launch for CallAmbulance will allow it to notify Ambulance about your location when ever you dial Emergency number in case of Emergency.Switch on CallAmbulance auto-launch button to start using this feature SMS invite will be sent to each of the selected contacts. This action may incur SMS charges as applicable.

We appreciate your patience as we upgrade our infrastructure in next few hours to meet your demand Thank You \n for embracing our concept FAQs on CallAmbulance \t\t\tWe are open for partnerships, crowd sourcing of ideas for faster Integration & adoption. Please share your ideas, suggestions with our founder jagadish@callambulance.in Please join us on our journey to see a safer India ! 11 Emergencies Forum Thanks for embracing the concept. We are overwhelmed with the support we got and are grateful for the same. We are scaling up infrastructure to meet the demand. Installed CallAmbulance Mobile app and bought CallAmbulance Basic Package that includes a Road Accident Insurance Policy, this gives me a cover of Rs 1,00,000/- for Inpatient treatment, Rs 5,000/- for Outpatient treatment and Rs 20,000/- for ambulance service with just 249/- premium per annum.
